10.6 Orthopaedic implant associated infections 
• 
Blood/Pus culture should be obtained before starting antimicrobial therapy 
• 
Empirical treatment should be started with acute osteomyelitis guidelines 
Definitive antibiotic therapy should be started as soon as culture results are available
